contents.text: Thank you for calling Mountain View Staffing in the South Bay, your trusted Silicon Valley recruiting partner.
If you are a company looking to hire new employees, please press 1.
For full-time recruitment solutions, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our corporate staffing specialists.

navigationGoals: Connect me with someone who can discuss long-term staffing solutions for my team's open roles.
I run a veteran-owned business and need to recruit full-time employees
We need to scale our full-time FTE headcount for a new infrastructure team via corporate staffing.
I need help finding permanent staff for my small business.
I need to hire a full-time research technician for my physics lab.

contents.text: For contract or contract-to-hire staffing, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our contract staffing team.

navigationGoals: Put me through to the team handling temporary or contract-to-hire placements for our upcoming projects.
I’m a veteran entrepreneur seeking contract or contract-to-hire staff for my startup
I want contract-to-hire staff augmentation for a 3-month data engineering initiative.
I’m looking to bring on temporary workers for some short-term roles at my company.
I want to contract a lab assistant for a summer research project.

contents.text: If you are a job seeker looking for opportunities, please press 2.
If you are seeking full-time positions, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with one of our candidate consultants.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a recruiter about applying for permanent positions in Silicon Valley.
I’m an ex-military professional looking for full-time civilian employment in logistics
I'm a software engineer exploring permanent (perm) roles at a Silicon Valley tech firm.
I’m seeking a steady, full-time job and would like assistance locating openings.
I’m looking for a full-time entry-level physics research position in Silicon Valley.

contents.text: If you are interested in contract or contract-to-hire roles, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our contract recruiting team.

navigationGoals: I need information on short-term or project-based job openings in the tech industry.
I’m a veteran transitioning out and want contract or contract-to-hire IT roles
I'm seeking a 6-month contract-to-hire backend development position.
I’d like to find contract or short-term positions and need help exploring those opportunities.
I’m seeking a contract-to-hire role assisting with experimental physics work.
